words.etymology_text: From Proto-Finnic *äkkidä. Cognates include Estonian äkki, Ingrian äkkii, Karelian äkkie, Veps äkkid and Votic ättši.

words.etymology_text: From Proto-Finnic *äkedä. Equivalent to *äkä + -eä; the root is probably a front-vowel variant of *aka-, itself borrowed from Proto-Germanic *agaz. Related to Estonian äge and Karelian äkie.
